snippet: Pope Francis said on Monday that his trip to the United States in September would be limited to Washington, New York and Philadelphia.
abstract: Pope Francis says time limits will preclude a visit to California during his September 2015 trip to United States, but he will visit Washington, New York and Philadelphia.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis said on Monday that his trip to the United States in September would be limited to Washington, New York and Philadelphia.

headline.main: Pope’s U.S. Trip Will Not Include California
headline.print_headline: Pope’s U.S. Trip Will Not Include California
